name: Crossroads Demon
text:
A Demon that likes to barter and trade. When given something of adequate value a Crossroads Demon can produce almost any item for their victims. Though the Demon will never lie, the requested object or deed will usually have a hidden consequence for the victim.
Crossroads Demons usually do not collect their price immediately, instead they prefer to wait, enjoying their victims frantic struggle to find some other item to trade in instead of the promised one.
?_Default Features__h3_
?__items?name=Split Tongue_Container_
?__items?name=Bag of Holding_Container_
?_Optional Features__h3_

name: Effigy
text:
?__Etherial_Popup_
Effigies are small manifestations of godly power, their form depends on the god they belong to.
An Effigy will not perform any actions on its own but can be used to channel spells through them.

name: Ghostly Companion
text:
?__Etherial__
A Ghost that may have any shape and form, constructed from the mind of a mage. The Ghosts Intelligence and Willpower is equal to its creator%SQ%s. The Ghosts Health is equal to their creator%SQ%s Willpower.

name: Pebbling
text:
?__Elemental__
?__Hard Shelled__

Pebblings are small boulder or pebble like creatures, their upper body consists of single piece of stone with small yellowish eyes. The body rests on a set of 4 to 8 small stone legs giving the creature a crab-like appearance.

name: Potion Vendor
text:
Sells any number of Potions and Alchemy Equipment
